articles.author: Oliver Laughland
articles.title: Ahmaud Arbery murder: trial laid bare America’s faultlines on race - The Guardian
articles.description: Verdict caps almost two years of anguish for the Arbery family, marked by allegations of corruption, bias and racism both inside and outside the courtroom
articles.content:
As the guilty verdicts were read aloud, one after the other, Ahmaud Arberys mother, Wanda Cooper-Jones, could be seen in the courthouse with tears in her eyes.
The three white men who murdered her s… [+6926 chars]
